channel.title: Item to interface [317]
channel.description:
Hello,
I can't find a real guide about adding a duel arena to a 317 server, so I decided to code it myself. But I'm stuck with a problem.
How to add items to an interface? I looked at the banking and trading methods, but I can't really find something. I'm also downloading the westscape source, since its got Duel arena in it, and im gonna look at the staking method. But if someone can give it to me right away, it would be better : )
Treet11

item.title: Item to interface [317]
item.dc:creator: @treet111 treet111
item.description:
@treet111 wrote:

OK thanks,

Actually I got another question:

Where to find the place where it tells the client (for example: in trade window) to say: Offer 1, and not use, drop, examine

Read full topic

item.title: Item to interface [317]

item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

It’s frame 246. Work out how to use it yourself.
